Description_lang: While Entropic Rift is active, your $?c3[Shadow damage is increased by $s1%] [Atonement healing is increased by $s2%].

description_blz.en_US: While Entropic Rift is active, your Atonement healing is increased by 20%.
description_blz.es_MX: Mientras Falla entrópica está activa, la sanación de Contrición aumenta un 20%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Enquanto Fenda Entrópica estiver ativa, aumenta em 20% a cura da sua Expiação.
description_blz.de_DE: Solange 'Entropischer Riss' aktiv ist, ist Eure Heilung von 'Abbitte' um 20% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: While Entropic Rift is active, your Atonement healing is increased by 20%.
description_blz.es_ES: Mientras Falla entrópica está activo, la sanación de Expiación aumenta un 20%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Tant que Faille entropique est active, vos soins d’Expiation sont augmentés de 20 %.
description_blz.it_IT: Quando è attiva, Fenditura Entropica aumenta le cure fornite da Espiazione del 20%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Пока действует "Энтропический разлом", "Искупление вины" восполняет на 20% больше здоровья.
description_blz.ko_KR: 혼돈의 균열이 활성화된 동안 속죄의 치유량이 20%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在混亂裂隙作用期間，你的贖罪的治療效果提高20%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 熵能裂隙激活时，你的救赎的治疗效果提高20%。
